instructions:
Cook the bacon in a dutch oven with some olive oil over medium heat until just cooked. Meanwhile cook pasta until al dente in just enough salted water to cover.

Shred cheese and mix in 1 egg and 3 egg yolks. When pasta is ready, temper eggs and cheese with pasta water.

When bacon is ready, remove from the pot and add some pepper to the fat. Then add 300ml pasta water and deglaze. Then add pasta and cook through. Take off heat and add tempered cheese and eggs as well as the bacon.
name: Pasta Carbonara
